it.unipi.cc.toretto.kmeans.KMCentroid

Class KMeansCentroid

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipi.cc.toretto.kmeans.KMCentroid.KMeansCentroid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<KMeansCentroid>, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<KMeansCentroid>

    public class KMeansCentroid
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<KMeansCentroid>
    This class represents a centroid Object from the Kmeans algorithm. has two fields: The Datapoint object and the ID of the centroid
